description.label: Description
description.heading: Activity Info
description.title: Add details about your activity
description.subtitle: You'll be able to edit these details later

additional.label: Additional info
additional.title: Add details about your activity
additional.subtitle: You'll be able to edit these details later

location.label: Location
location.title: Where do I go when I get to the site?
location.subtitle: Let participants know about any meeting instructions

pricing.label: Pricing
pricing.title: How much does your activity cost?
pricing.subtitle: You can add more than one pricing option

restrictions.label: Who it's for
restrictions.title: Who is your activity for?
restrictions.subtitle: Specify any restrictions that apply and disabilities catered for

contact.label: Contact info
contact.title: Who can people talk to about this activity?
contact.subtitle: Help potential attendees by providing details of who they can contact

social.label: Social media
social.title: Where can people find more information about your activity online?
social.subtitle: Help potential attendees by providing links where they can find out more

photo.label: Photo
photo.title: Add a photo of your activity
photo.subtitle: Show people what to expect from this activity

schedule.label: Add a schedule
schedule.heading: Scheduling
schedule.title: Add a schedule for your sessions
schedule.subtitle: You can add multiple dates for sessions which occur regularly

title.label: Activity Title
title.tip: Enter a title for your activity. Note that the dates and times of activities will be pulled from the booking system, so there is no need to include this here.

OrganizerUuid.label: Site Name
OrganizerUuid.tip: Enter the name of the site

description.label: Activity Description
description.tip: Let people know what's great about the activity! Remember: the more detail you provide, the more likely people are to decide to attend.
description.example: Tips: Who is this activity for? What benefits will people get from it? What will the activity be like? What will we do? Is any prior experience needed?

ActivityUuid.label: Sport or activity category
ActivityUuid.tip: Enter the type of activity or sport on offer.

Activities.label: Sport or activity category
Activities.tip: Enter the type of activity or sport on offer.

preparation.label: Is there anything participants should bring?
preparation.tip: Let participants know how to prepare for your activity. Is there anything they will need to bring?

leader.label: Who is the leader for this activity?
leader.tip: Enter the name of the person who will be leading the activity. It's helpful for participants to know who's in charge when they arrive

location.label: Address
location.tip: Type to search an address and select from the dropdown

meetingPoint.label: Meeting Instructions
meetingPoint.tip: What should participants do when they arrive at the venue or location? Try to be as specific as possible.
meetingPoint.example: E.g. Meet in the main reception area

genderRestriction.label: Gender restrictions
genderRestriction.tip: Select 'none' if there are no restrictions on gender

minAgeRestriction.label: Is there a minimum age?
minAgeRestriction.tip: If there is a minimum age, select 'yes' then enter the age

maxAgeRestriction.label: Is there a maximum age?
maxAgeRestriction.tip: If there is a maximum age, select 'yes' then enter the age

abilityRestriction.label: Are you able to offer support to people with disabilities?
abilityRestriction.tip: Please tick all disabilities that you can cater for in your activity. If you are not sure, do not tick any

contactName.label: Full name
contactName.tip: Who's the best person for attendees to contact if they have questions about this activity?

socialWebsite.label: Website
socialWebsite.tip: Enter the website URL where potential attendees can find out more information about your activities. Linking to the specific page on your site that relates to the activity is better if possible

socialFacebook.label: Facebook page or group
socialFacebook.tip: Enter the URL of your Facebook page or Facebook group, where attendees can see who else usually attends

socialInstagram.label: Instagram
socialInstagram.tip: Enter the Instragram Account for your organisation

socialTwitter.label: Twitter handle
socialTwitter.tip: Enter the Twitter Handle for your organisation

socialHashtag.label: Hashtag
socialHashtag.tip: Enter the Hashtag for your activity, if you have one

image.tipTitle: upload a real photo of your activity
image.tip: People are much more likely to attend an activity if it has a real photo (One taken on your smartphone will do)
